name: CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX
description: This table is used to expand the Case Management - History Associated Value (I HSB 18440) ASSOC_CMGMT_SSP_CHANGED_LINE field in CMGMT_EPISODE_HX to a copy of the Support & Services Provided table (SC_EPISODE_SUPPORT_TYPES). For actions of type 16 - Support & Services Provided changed in CMGMT_EPISODE_HX, each value_line in this related multi group represents a line from the PREVIOUS state of the COCM - Support & Services Type (I HSB 64050) super item. The current Support & Service Types will always be found in SC_EPISODE_SUPPORT_TYPES.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
